title: Deliver End-User Training
description: A consultant needs to train a department of 50 end-users on the core features of the product.

tasks.description: Customize the standard end-user training deck to include screenshots and examples from the customer's own configured environment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Consultant tailors the training to be highly relevant to the audience.

tasks.description: Deliver the training session in a 'train-the-trainer' format to a group of the customer's team leads.
tasks.expected_outcome: Consultant effectively enables the customer's champions to train their own teams.

tasks.description: Provide a Q&A document and a recording of the session for future reference.
tasks.expected_outcome: Consultant provides lasting training assets to the customer.
